english: It doesn't make much sense, though.
He wants someone to save Hero.

text: İnşallah kendisi de sevdikleri de feraha çıkarlar
english: I hope he and his loved ones find comfort.

text: Beyimizi yalnız koyduk Vallahi o içime dokunur
english: ♪ We put our lord alone ♪ ♪ I swear he'll touch me inside ♪

text: Pusta, ıssızda yalnız koysak o kadar huzursuzlanmazdım
english: I wouldn't be so nervous if we put him alone in the stroller, in the middle of nowhere.

text: Beyimiz başının çaresine bakar Bamsı kardeş
english: Our master can take care of himself, Brother Bamsi.

text: obamız göçe başlamıştır. Onlara yurt diye nereyi göstereceğiz, ona dertlen
english: Our obas is on the move, so where are we going to show them a dorm, so worry about it?
Our brother Turgut is in the hands of the shroud.

text: Aykız'a bunu nasıl deriz, ona dertlen
english: How do we call the moongirl, worry about her?

text: Vay başıma gelen! Vallahi ben diyemem
english: Oh, my God, I can't say that.
I can't bear the sadness of my sister
It's gonna be all right, Brother Bamsy.

text: O, öyle ah vah edip dövünecek birisi değildir
english: He's not one to be beaten.

text: Şu işin hakkından bir gelelim hele, sonrasını düşünürüz
english: Let's get this over with, and then we'll figure it out.
It's okay, it's okay. It's just a dream.
I know my Turgut's no good.

text: Turgut'un başında bir bela var Gökçe!
english: There's trouble at Turgut's head, Gökçe!

text: Allah göstermesin Ertuğrul'a bir şey olup da
english: God forbid something happened to Ertugrul.

text: berat ulaşmamış olsaydı böyle olmazdı beyim
english: It wouldn't have happened if it hadn't arrived, sir.

text: Bu iş, kendini bilmez muhafızların yaptığı işe pek benzemez
english: This isn't exactly the work of self-righteous guards.
There's something we don't know about Aleppo.

text: Bizim şehre girmeyişimizin nedenini öğrenmemiz lazım
english: We need to find out why we didn't enter the city.

text: Bizim eli kolu bağlı burada durmamız olmaz
english: We can't just stand here with our hands tied.

text: Halep'e girmenin bir yolunu bulmak lazım
english: We have to find a way into Aleppo.

text: Eğer iznin olursa beyim, yarın bir başıma ben gireyim
english: If you'll excuse me, sir, I'll go in alone tomorrow.
Maybe this time we'll get past the guards.

text: Bu dediğin pek mümkün görünmüyor ama

english: We have no choice but to try.
We don't know what's going on in Aleppo.
It wouldn't be sending you to the unknown.

text: Siz daha iyi bilirsiniz beyim ama
english: You know better than that, sir.

text: bir başına, genç bir kızdan kimse şüphe duymaz
english: Alone, no one doubts a young girl

text: annemin hastalığına derman aramak için şehre geldiğimi söylerim
english: I'll tell my mom I'm in town looking for a cure.

text: ben de Aykız'a yoldaşlık etmek isterim
english: I'd like to keep Aygirl company.
When it comes to it, he's as brave as the privates.

text: Alpler kadar iyi bir savaşçı olmayı bilirler
english: They know how to be as good a warrior as the Alps.

text: er gibi esaslı durmak bize de nasip olmuştu gençliğimizde
english: It's been a privilege for us to stand firm as a soldier when we were young.

text: her devirde erinin gücüne güç katmıştır, biliriz elbet
english: We certainly know that every time a man has power over a man,

text: kızlarımızı bu yaban ellerde bir başına bırakmak olmaz
english: We can't leave our daughters alone in these wild hands.
Take Aygirl and Gökçe with you

text: kızlarıyla yolculuk eden bir babaya muhafızlar insaf etsinler
english: Let the guards have mercy on a father who travels with his daughters.

text: Bu defa yol bizi zorlayacak Gündoğdu'm
english: This time the road will push us, my sunshine.

text: Bu gebe halimle soğuklarda nasıl dayanırım?
english: How can I stand the cold when I'm pregnant?
All three of us can last, God willing!
Are there Hayme Mothers in Aleppo?

text: Keşke anamın sözünü dinleyip seni de onlarla yollasaydım
english: I wish I'd listened to my mother and sent you with them.

text: Ben senin yanında olayım bana hiçbir şey olmaz
english: I'll be with you. Nothing will happen to me.
Let's get going before it's too late.

text: Ertuğrul'un Halep’te verdiği adres hatırında mıdır, Deli Demir?
english: Do you remember Ertugrul's address in Aleppo, Mad Demir?
A saffron in the Aleppo market, sir.

text: Sahaf sahibinin ismi de Abdülkadir El Halebi
english: Sahef owner's name is Abdulkadir Al Halebi
I hope you'll come back soon.

text: Fatma Ana'mızın mübarek eli sırtınızdan eksilmesin
english: Don't let Mama Fatma's blessed hand fall off your back.
I hope you come back with good news.
May God forgive you and help you.

text: azıcık kuvvetli üfleyen bir adam çıksa, dalgalanır, kabarır
english: When a man comes out with a little bit of a blow, it swells and swells.
Is that what great hope is, Alpargu?
Don't you remember the Caspian Sea?

text: Hazar, arada bir durulur ama bir kabardı mı
english: Caspian, once in a while it settles but once in a while it swells
The set won't hold in front of you.
Don't be sad that it's time for a charm
I'm sure it's time for the tide.

text: Bir günden bir güne, tek kelimenden şüphe duymadım
english: One day in a row, I didn't doubt a word.

text: Lakin, bu kadar umutlu oluşunu anlayamadım
english: But I didn't realize how hopeful he was.

text: Can alalım derken az kalsın canımızdan oluyorduk
english: We almost got killed trying to take lives.

text: senin beyin, daha son kozunu oynamadı
english: Your brain hasn't played its last card yet.
We haven't heard from Black Toygar yet.

text: Belki de Kara Toygar Konya'dan buralara muştulu haberlerle dönecek
english: Maybe Black Toygar will come back from the Consolidated with good news.
Of course, this is good news.
To whom to play the wedding
I'm going to Miss Leyla's room.

text: Misafiri çok şükür iştahlanmış da ona yemek götürüyorum
english: Thank God the guest is hungry and I'm bringing him food.
Is this what you came for?
I'm here to take your head.
There's bound to be justice here.

text: ve sarayın muhafızlarını öldüren bir katil
english: And a murderer who killed the guards of the palace.
You flew like a bird into our trap
When you say you're going bird hunting,

text: bildikleri gerçekleri söylemekten başka suçları olmayan masum şahitleri
english: Innocent witnesses who are guilty of nothing but telling the truth they know.

text: ve Emir hazretlerinin muhafızlarını öldürmekten hapis altına alındın
english: And you're in prison for the murder of His Majesty's guards.
When you see so many guards
I doubted the safety of the palace.
